rukus.text: 14|42|joeindeul-i haenghaneun geos-eul hana nim-i mugwansimhada saeng-gagchi malla sil lo geubun-eun geunal-eul wihayeo geudeul-eul yuyehal ppun-ini geudeul-ui nundeul-eun geu nal gongpolo eungsihalila
14|43|geudeul-eun seodulleo mog-eul gilge hago meolileul se-umyeo geudeul-ui nundeul-eun dulyeoum-eulo gadeugcha balaboji moshanani geudeul-ui ma-eum-eun gongheohanila

14|44|salamdeul-ege jaeang-i ol geunal eul gyeong-gohani joeindeul-i malhagil ju yeo eolmagan jeohuileul yuyehayeo juso seo jeohuineun dangsin-ui buleum-e bogjongha go seonjijadeul-eul ttaleugessnaida hanigalasadae neohuineun ijeon-e neohuiegejongmal-i oji anihal geos-ila maengse haji anihaessdeonyo
14|45|neohuineun seuseuloleul ulonghan mu liui jugeojieseo salgo iss-eul ttae hananim-i geudeul-ege eotteohge hayeoss-eumyeotto hananim-i neohuileul wihae bunmyeonghan biyulo seolmyeonghasyeossnola
14|46|geudeul-i eummohayeoss-euna geudeul ui eummoga bilog sandeul-eul jindonghanda hayeodo geudeul-ui eummoneun hananim an e iss-eossnola
14|47|hananimkke geubun-ui seonjijadeul-ege yagsog-eul eogil geos-ila saeng-gagchi malla sillo hananim-eun ungboui gwonneung-i iss-eusinila
14|48|eoneunal jiguga daleun geos-eulo byeonhago haneul-i geuleohani modeun geos i mudeom-eseo nawa hollo gyesimyeo gwonneung-eulo chungmanhasin hananimkkelo oneunila
14|49|geunal geudaeneun jogswaee mukk-yeo issneun joeindeul-eul bolila
14|50|geunal geudeul-ui uisang-eun aegchelo doeeo iss-eumyeo bul-i geudeul-ui eolgul-eul dulleo ssanola
14|51|hananim-eun gagja-ege geuga eod eun geos mankeum bosanghasini sillo hananim-eun gyesan-e neunghasidoda
14|52|igeos-i baegseong-eul wihan meseji lo geudeullo hayeogeum gyeong-gyehadolog ha go geudeullo hayeogeum hananim-i hollo gyesim-eul alge hago ilohayeo jisig indeul-i gyohun-eul samdolog ham-ila
